articles.description: Inter Miami CF (7W-14L-4D, 25 points) will aim to carry on with the team's recent strong form when it hosts Sporting Kansas City (8W-11L-8D, 32 points) for the first matchup between the sides this Saturday, Sept. 9. Kick off at DRV PNK Stadium is set for 7:30…
